sentences.english: The name Baobab commands respect in many sectors of the galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 貝歐巴這個名字在銀河系許多星區受人敬仰。

sentences.english: Each galaxy contains myriads of stars.
sentences.chinese: 地球是銀河系中的星球之一。

sentences.english: The former Manchester United player's contract with Los Angeles Galaxy runs out at the end of December.
sentences.chinese: 前曼聯球星與洛杉磯銀河隊的合同12底就將到期。

sentences.english: MengFei resigned from the galactic work, but in the heart of the earth can't throw Chen son.
sentences.chinese: 孟菲辭去了銀河工作，但是陳超心裏照舊丟不下欣兒。

sentences.english: Coruscant continued as the capital of the galaxy under this new regime.
sentences.chinese: 在這個新政權的統治下，科洛桑依然是銀河系的首都。

sentences.english: She separated the couple by drawing a river, the Milky Way, with her hairpin between them.
sentences.chinese: 她用金簪畫出了銀河隔開了這對夫妻。

sentences.english: But this world there is only one Wang Xiaobo, Li Yinhe is also gone.
sentences.chinese: 可是這世上只有一個王小波，還是李銀河的，還走了。

sentences.english: A porter from the Galaxy Hotel is welcoming Mr.
sentences.chinese: 一位銀河賓館的行李搬運工在大廳裏接待布朗先生。

sentences.english: We of the Ashtar Galactic Command thank you for your attention.
sentences.chinese: 我們，阿西塔銀河系的指揮部，感謝你們的注意。

sentences.english: We will try to be a new type of Galacticos who are more practical.
sentences.chinese: 我們會打造新型的銀河戰艦，會更實用一些。

sentences.english: The lure of the blood trade drew Durge away from his tribe and into the rest of the galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 血腥交易的誘惑把德奇拖離部族，帶向銀河別處。

sentences.english: I was hiding behind the silversides, low in the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我當時是隱藏在銀河魚後面的礁石間。

sentences.english: Through the Force, Yoda felt the sudden loss of life across the galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 尤達通過原力感到，許多生命突然在銀河系中消失了。

sentences.english: The diamond jewelry shines like the flowing galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 這的鑽飾，似銀河輕瀉，熠熠閃耀。

sentences.english: And twinkle on the milky way.
sentences.chinese: 像銀河中閃爍的星光點點。

sentences.english: Galaxy investment new drama "if love you" invited to join Chen rejected.
sentences.chinese: 銀河投資的新劇《假如愛你》力邀陳超加盟遭拒。

definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to fly across/to fly over/to fly past/(literary) (of one's spirits) to soar

Chaoyang district in east and northeast Beijing, a county level district of Beijing municipality/Chaoyang prefecture-level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China/Chaoyang district of Changchun city 長春市|长春市, Jilin/Chaoyang county in Chaoyang 朝陽|朝阳[Chao2 yang2], Liaoning
to be exposed to the sun/in a position facing the sun
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
